Create a "mystery scent" game where the user has to guess the name of the perfume based on clues provided by the AI.
Develop a "scent memory" game where the user has to identify different scents based on their memory of the perfume bottle.
Create a "scent matching" game where the user has to match different perfume scents with their corresponding bottle.
Develop a "scent quiz" game where the user has to answer questions about perfume bottles and their scents.
Create a "scent memory challenge" where the user has to memorize the scent of a perfume bottle and then identify it after a period of time.
